EASEMYTRIP : 17-Sep-2024 :  The Company has informed the Exchange that a Board meeting to be held on September 13, 2024 has been re-scheduled. Further, the Company has informed the Exchange that the meeting of the Board of Directors of the Company will be held on September 17, 2024,  To consider other business matters
To consider other business matters purchase/repurchase of NCD's and cancellation thereof
